gurmukhi: qb hI iqh rudR srUp DrXo ]jg jMq sMGwr kY jog krXo ]4]
transliteration: Tab Hitih Rudra Saroop Ddaryo|| Jag Jant Sandhar Kai Jog Daryo||4||
translation: Then Vishnu manifested himself as Rudra and destroying the beings of the world, he established Yoga.4.

gurmukhi: kihhoN isv jYsk ju`D kIey ]suK sMqn ko ijh BwNq dIey ]
transliteration: Kahehon Siv Jaisak Juddh Keee|| Soukh Santan Ko Jih Bhaant Deee||
translation: I shall describe now as to how Shiva waged wars and gave comfort to the saints;

gurmukhi: gin hoN ijh BwNq brI igrjw ]jgjIq suXMbr mo spRBw ]5]
transliteration: Gad(i) Hon Jih Bhaant Barigirjaa|| Jagjeet Suyanbar Mo Saprabhaa||5||
translation: I shall also tell how he wedded Parbati after conquering her in the Swayyamvara (self-selection of a husband from amongst the suitors).5.

gurmukhi: ijm AMDk soN hir ju`Du krXo ]ijh BwNq mnoj ko mwn hrXo ]
transliteration: Jim Andhak Son Har(i) Juddh(u) Daryo|| Jih Bhaant Manoj Ko Maan Daryo||
translation: How Shiva waged a war against Andgakasura? How is effaced the pride of Cupid?

gurmukhi: dl dYq dly kr kop ijmM ]kihhoN sB Coir pRsMg iqmM ]6]
transliteration: Dal Dait Dale Kar Kop Jiman|| Kahehon Sabh Chhodh(i) Prasan Timan||6||
translation: Getting furious, how he mashed the gathering of demons? I shall describe all these anecdotes.6.

gurmukhi: jb hoq Drn Bwrw krwNq ]qb prq nwih iqh hiRdy swNq ]
transliteration: Jab Hot Dharan Dhaaraa Karaant|| Tab Parat Naah(i) Tih Hride Saant||
translation: When the earth is pressed by the load of sins, then she cannot have peace in her heart.

gurmukhi: cl dD smuMdR kreI pukwr ]qb Drq ibsn rudRwvqwr ]7]
transliteration: Chal Dadh Samounndra Daraipoukaar|| Tab Dharat Bisan Rudraavtaar||7||
translation: Then she goes and shouts loudly in the milk-ocean and the Rudra incarnation of Vishnu is manifested.7.

gurmukhi: qb krq skl dwnv sMGwr ]kr dnuj pRlv sMqn auDwr ]
transliteration: Tab Karat Sakal Daanav Sandhaar|| Kar Danuj Pralav Santan Udhaar||
translation: After manifestation, Rudra destroys the demons and crushing them, he protects the saints.

gurmukhi: ieh BwNiq skl kir dust nws ]puin kriq hiRdY Bgvwn bws ]8]
transliteration: Eh Bhaant(i) Sakal Kar(i) Doust Naas|| Poun(i) Karat(i) Hridai Bhagvaan Baas||
translation: In this way, destroying all the tyrants, he then abides in the heart of his devotees.8.
